name.th: วอลเปเปอร์สีดำ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Black Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Dark Black background. Black wallpaper background themes for dark fans.
short.ca: Negre Wallpaper canvia la pestanya nova amb el fons de pantalla Negre. Temes per als fans de Negre.
short.de: Schwarz Wallpaper Ändern Sie den neuen Tab mit Schwarz Wallpaper Hintergrund. Themen für Schwarz Fans.
short.es: Negra Wallpaper cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo de pantalla de Negra. Temas para los fans de Negra.
short.fil: Ang Itim na Wallpaper ay nagbabago ng bagong tab gamit ang background ng wallpaper ng Itim na.
short.fr: Noir Wallpaper change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran Noir. Thèmes pour les fans de Noir.
short.hi: ब्लैक वॉलपेपर ब्लैक वॉलपेपर पृष्ठभूमि के साथ नया टैब बदलें। काले प्रशंसकों के लिए थीम्स।
short.id: Hitam Wallpaper mengubah tab baru dengan latar belakang wallpaper Hitam. Tema untuk penggemar Hitam.
short.it: Lo sfondo di Nero cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo dello sfondo di Nero. Temi per i fan di Nero.
short.ja: 黒の壁紙は、黒の壁紙の背景で新しいタブを変更します。黒ファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 검정 바탕 화면은 검정 바탕 화면 배경으로 새 탭을 변경합니다. 검정 팬들을위한 테마.
short.pl: Czarna tapeta zmienia nową kartę z czarnym tłem tapety. Motywy dla fanów Czarna.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Preto Wallpaper mudar nova guia com o fundo de papel de parede Preto. Temas para fãs de Preto.
short.th: วอลเปเปอร์สีดำเปลี่ยนแท็บใหม่ด้วยวอลเปเปอร์พื้นหลังสีดำสีดำ ธีมสำหรับแฟน ๆ สีดำ
short.tr: Siyah Duvar Kağıdı, Siyah duvar kağıdı arka planıyla yeni sekmeyi değiştirdi. Siyah hayranları için temalar.
short.vi: Hình nền Đen thay đổi tab mới với hình nền hình nền Đen. Chủ đề dành cho người hâm mộ Đen.
short.zh_CN: 黑色壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为黑色的背景壁纸。黑色粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 黑色壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為黑色的背景壁紙。黑色粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
This extension features some of the great Black background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Black wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Black background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Black new tab.
long.ca,de,es,fil,fr,hi,id,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_BR,:
This extension features some of the great Black background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Black wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Black background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Black new tab.
